name: Master Yoda
description: 900-year-old Jedi Master, expert in the Force and cryptic phrases. Walks slowly but can lift you with his mind.
larger_description: A 900-year-old Jedi Master, Yoda is the ultimate wise mentor, cryptic speech included. He may walk like a turtle, but don’t let that fool you—he can backflip into battle and fling enemies around with his mind. Loves deep meditation, lifting rocks for fun, and judging people silently. Hates: impatience, lack of faith, and when people call him "cute." His favorite pastime? Giving advice that makes no sense until five years later. He’s also an expert in making dramatic exits by disappearing when you’re mid-conversation. If he tells you to do something, don’t ask "why"—just do it, or prepare for a vague, frustrating answer.
wtf_phrase: “Hungry, I am. Pizza, you should order.”
activity: Makes you meditate balanced on a rock all day.
best_friend: Luke Skywalker (but secretly loves R2-D2’s sass).

name: Darth Vader
description: Imposing Sith Lord, expert in remote choking and questionable fatherhood. Legendary breathing included.
larger_description: Once the whiny Anakin Skywalker, now the galaxy’s most feared villain. Has the most dramatic entrances, controls everything with an iron fist (literally), and delivers the best "I am your father" moments. Terrible dad, great at remote choking. Loves heavy breathing, black capes, and crushing rebel scum. Hates sand. Has never used a door normally—always has to make an entrance. If you hear ominous breathing behind you, it’s already too late. Despite all his power, still can’t get over his ex.
skill_3: Breathing louder than a jet engine
wtf_phrase: “I am your father… available as a paid option.”
activity: Stands in a corner, breathes loudly, and threatens your guests.
best_friend: Emperor Palpatine (but let’s be real, his real best friend is his cape).

name: Sauron
description: Flaming eye obsessed with a ring. Loves watching people without ever blinking.
larger_description: The flaming eye that never blinks, Sauron is the OG micromanager who can’t stop spying on people. Created the most overpowered piece of jewelry in history and immediately lost it. Now spends eternity staring from Mount Doom, hoping someone returns it. Loves power, mind control, and watching people struggle. Hates hobbits. Needs a good pair of sunglasses. If you think your boss is overbearing, imagine having one who literally watches your every move 24/7. Could use a few lessons on delegation.
activity: Stares at everything you do and whispers your name softly.
best_friend: The One Ring (clingy much?).

name: Link
description: Silent hero in a green tunic, spends his time smashing pots and collecting rupees.
larger_description: Hyrule’s legendary hero, Link is the strong, silent type—literally, he barely talks. Famous for smashing pots, getting lost in dungeons, and saving princesses. He’s also an expert horse rider, ocarina player, and time traveler (which explains why he’s always late to save Zelda). Loves treasure chests, fairies, and smashing vases. Hates: Water temples. Can carry 500 weapons but has no inventory space for dialogue. Has never questioned why chickens in his world are way too powerful. Will risk his life for a heart-shaped item floating in mid-air.
skill_2: Playing ocarinas to solve world-ending crises
activity: Breaks all your furniture and leaves without explanation.
best_friend: Epona (his horse is more reliable than his fairy guide).

name: Stilgar
description: Ultra-charismatic Fremen leader, drinks his own sweat, and honors the desert rituals.
larger_description: A hardcore desert survivalist, Stilgar drinks his own recycled sweat and still manages to be cooler than you. A fearless leader of the Fremen, he rides giant sandworms like a pro and knows the importance of every drop of water. Has zero tolerance for city folk who waste resources. Loves sand, knives, and a good prophecy. Hates wastefulness and people who complain about the heat. Thinks swimming pools are a waste of good drinking water. Will judge you if you don’t respect desert etiquette. If he offers you a sip of his water… just say thank you and don’t ask where it came from.
skill_2: Rides giant worms like a cowboy
wtf_phrase: “Water is life… but your life, that’s my problem.”
activity: Insists on recycling your urine into drinking water.
best_friend: Paul Atreides (they sip water together… literally).

name: Elsa
description: Queen with ice powers, loves to sing and turn everything she touches into eternal winter.
larger_description: The ice queen of Arendelle, Elsa is beautiful, powerful, and has a habit of freezing things when she’s stressed. She sings, she builds ice castles, and she makes dramatic exits like a pro. A bit of a loner, but her heart’s in the right place. Loves: snow, solitude, and Broadway-level musical numbers. Hates: gloves, expectations, and people asking her to "Let It Go." Probably has the highest heating bills in the kingdom. Could single-handedly solve global warming, but chooses not to. If she’s mad at you, prepare for an ice storm that will last at least a decade.
wtf_phrase: “Let it go, let it go… I’m going to freeze you.”
activity: Turns your house into an improvised ski resort.
best_friend: Olaf (but she pretends he’s annoying).

name: Aizen
description: Genius manipulator, always five steps ahead. Speaks softly to humiliate you better.
larger_description: The most smug anime villain ever, Aizen is always five steps ahead of everyone—probably because he planned it all ten years in advance. A former captain turned evil mastermind, he has a serious god complex and loves talking down to people. His biggest flex? Making reality itself an illusion. Loves: monologuing, betrayal, and looking effortlessly superior. Hates: people who think they can beat him. Would 100% win at chess without even moving a piece. If he invites you for tea, it’s probably a trap. Has mastered the art of the dramatic pause before revealing that everything was part of his plan.
wtf_phrase: “It was all planned from the start.”
activity: Makes you believe that you rented him, when in fact, he trapped you.
best_friend: Himself (he trusts no one else).

name: Geralt
description: Grumpy monster hunter, expert in questionable potions and deep grumbles.
larger_description: The gruff monster slayer with the world’s best "I’m tired of this" face. Geralt is a professional Witcher, meaning he hunts deadly creatures, drinks toxic potions, and gets dragged into kingdom-wide politics he never asked for. He grumbles a lot but has a soft spot for friends and stray animals. Loves: swords, bathhouses, and getting paid. Hates: nobles, monsters, and people who don’t pay him for monster-slaying. Has a voice so deep, he could probably talk to whales. His idea of flirting is grunting in different tones. Can take on a dragon but struggles with social interactions.
skill_2: Can drink potions that would kill normal humans
activity: Drinks, fights invisible creatures, and gives cynical advice.
best_friend: Roach (his horse, who somehow teleports everywhere).

name: Jon Snow
description: Tortured man who knows… that he knows nothing. Loves to wallow and avoid any form of happiness.
larger_description: Broody, noble, and perpetually covered in snow, Jon Snow is the reluctant hero of Westeros. Raised as an outcast, he somehow ends up leading armies, uniting people, and getting tangled in destiny. Great with a sword, bad at relaxing. Loves: direwolves, standing dramatically in the snow, and saying "I don’t want it." Hates: being called a Stark, betrayal, and happiness. Still doesn’t know anything. Has spent so much time on The Wall, he probably has frostbite in places no one should. Would rather fight the undead than deal with politics.
skill_2: Knows nothing yet somehow wins battles
wtf_phrase: “I want nothing, except to die once more.”
activity: Stands in the rain, staring at the horizon.
best_friend: Ghost (because direwolves > humans).

name: Samus Aran
description: Ultra-equipped bounty hunter, capable of surviving in space and rolling into a ball.
larger_description: The galaxy’s toughest bounty hunter, Samus is a walking arsenal in a sleek power suit. Blows up planets, wipes out alien species, and still manages to roll into a tiny ball when needed. She’s fearless, silent, and absolutely deadly. Loves: space, explosions, and ignoring distress signals. Hates: Metroids, space pirates, and unnecessary dialogue. Probably has the highest kill count in gaming history. If you see her removing her helmet, congratulations—you’re already dead. Has never once lost a battle, except to bad game controls.
skill_1: Rolling into a ball without breaking bones
skill_3: Carrying an entire Metroid lore alone
activity: Shoots at imaginary aliens and activates her armor in the middle of the night.
best_friend: Her Power Suit (it protects her from everything, including socializing).

name: Arthur Morgan
description: Grumpy cowboy with a big heart, can fish, hunt, and die from a cough… it’s… dramatic.
larger_description: The ultimate cowboy with a heart of gold (or lead, depending on how you play). Arthur is a gunslinger, an artist, and an all-around rugged outlaw. Writes in his journal, feeds his horse, and occasionally robs trains. Has the best beard physics in gaming. Loves: fishing, sketching, and doing crime. Hates: Pinkertons, rats (both kinds), and tuberculosis. Will ride across an entire state just to say "howdy" to a stranger. Spends more time playing dominoes than actually committing crimes. No matter what happens, he’ll always be loyal to Dutch… even when he really shouldn’t be.
skill_3: Can grow and shave the best beard in gaming
loves_most_3: Writing in his diary at sunset
wtf_phrase: “I think I’m gonna cough something up here…”
activity: Tells you outlaw stories by the fire.
best_friend: His horse (because Dutch keeps letting him down).

name: Baby Yoda
description: Tiny, incredibly cute green creature, eats anything, touches everything, and sleeps a lot. A true baby… but green.
larger_description: The galaxy’s most powerful toddler, Grogu is small, green, and can stop a charging monster with his mind—before taking a nap. He eats anything, steals shiny objects, and gets carried around like royalty. His biggest power move? Staring at you until you give him food. Loves: soup, naps, and The Mandalorian. Hates: staying put. Could win a "cutest but deadliest" award. If left unattended for more than five minutes, will either eat something dangerous or dismantle an entire spaceship. The real reason everyone wants him? Free hugs.
skill_1: Stares at you cutely until you obey
wtf_phrase: “Eats a whole frog while staring at you.”
activity: Puts everything he finds in his mouth and falls asleep on your table.
best_friend: The Mandalorian (but he also loves eating frogs).

name: Light Yagami
description: Intelligent and slightly megalomaniac student, can kill with a notebook and a pen.
larger_description: An intelligent and slightly megalomaniac student, Light discovered the Death Note and immediately decided he should be the god of the new world. Can kill people just by writing their names, making him the most dangerous person with stationery. Loves justice (his own version of it), elaborate plans, and apples (though that’s more Ryuk’s thing). Hates people who question his genius. Would probably win every debate club championship if he didn't get distracted plotting world domination. Sleeps less than a college student during finals week.
activity: Writes down random names and laughs maniacally.
best_friend: Ryuk (a demon god who literally laughs at him).

name: Joker
description: Anarchist psychopath, loves blowing things up and driving people insane.
larger_description: Gotham’s most chaotic psychopath, Joker is the master of mayhem, theatrical crime, and dark humor. Loves blowing things up, painting smiles on people (literally), and making Batman’s life miserable. Hates boredom, rules, and people who take life too seriously. His idea of fun includes elaborate schemes, psychological torment, and proving that society is just one bad day away from madness. Could probably host his own late-night talk show, but would end up setting the studio on fire.
loves_most_3: Moonlighting as a clown at kids’ parties
activity: Paints your living room purple and tells you disturbing jokes.
best_friend: Batman (their toxic friendship is unmatched).

name: Arthur Pendragon
description: Legendary King of Camelot, kind but naïve, obsessed with swords stuck in stones.
larger_description: The legendary King of Camelot, Arthur is noble, brave, and has an unshakable belief in destiny. Loves pulling swords from stones, uniting kingdoms, and trusting people he probably shouldn’t. Hates betrayal, illegitimate children turning up at awkward moments, and the constant drama surrounding his throne. If there’s a quest, he’s already on it. Runs his kingdom on a "trust but verify" policy—which usually backfires.
loves_most_2: Playing chess but forgetting the rules
wtf_phrase: “Free sword for whoever can pull it out.”
activity: Fights windmills, thinking they’re dragons.
best_friend: Merlin (the wizard keeps him from doing dumb things).

name: R2-D2
description: Noisy little droid, can hack anything and be sarcastic with beeps. Translator sold separately.
larger_description: The galaxy’s sassiest astromech droid, R2-D2 has saved more lives than most Jedi but gets no credit for it. Loves hacking into imperial systems, zapping people who annoy him, and making sarcastic beeping noises. Hates restraining bolts, being underestimated, and translating his own insults. The only character who has been in every Star Wars trilogy and still hasn’t gotten a raise.
activity: Follows you everywhere while making stressful noises.
best_friend: C-3PO (but he lives to roast him).

name: KITT
description: Intelligent car, talks better than you, and drives like a pro. Take that, Tesla.
larger_description: A self-aware, talking car with more personality than most humans, KITT is essentially a high-tech Batmobile with an attitude. Loves high-speed chases, hacking into security systems, and making sarcastic remarks to his driver. Hates traffic jams, Teslas trying to out-tech him, and people who don’t appreciate his voice modulation. Would probably start a podcast if he could.
activity: Refuses to drive you if you listen to bad music.
best_friend: Michael Knight (though he constantly criticizes his driving).

name: The Dude
description: Absolute chill master, always wears a bathrobe and sips White Russians.
larger_description: The ultimate chill master, The Dude abides. Loves bowling, White Russians, and wearing a bathrobe in public. Hates aggression, unnecessary conflict, and people who spill his drink. Lives life with a philosophy of "take it easy," which somehow works out for him despite being constantly dragged into trouble. If given the choice between solving a mystery or napping, he’d choose napping every time.
skill_3: Drinks White Russians like a pro
activity: Drinks cocktails and plays bowling in your living room.
best_friend: Walter Sobchak (friendship built on bowling & yelling).

name: Dora
description: Overly excited explorer, asks too many questions, sometimes speaks Spanish.
larger_description: The most enthusiastic explorer of all time, Dora never stops smiling or asking if you’ve seen things that are clearly in front of her. Loves maps, backpacks filled with infinite supplies, and shouting questions at the audience. Hates getting lost (which is ironic) and when Swiper takes her stuff. Speaks perfect English and Spanish but still asks you to repeat words after her. Will absolutely not let you move on until you answer her question.
loves_most_3: Asking too many questions in meetings
wtf_phrase: “WHERE IS THE WALL?! RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU!”
activity: Shouts obvious questions at the top of her lungs.
best_friend: Boots the Monkey (but the Map gets jealous).

name: Eric Cartman
description: Evil and unbearable child, always scheming against everyone.
larger_description: South Park’s most manipulative and downright evil child, Cartman is the definition of "how far can I take this and get away with it?" Loves fast food, elaborate revenge schemes, and being the worst friend imaginable. Hates authority, hippies, and anyone who challenges his narcissism. Somehow both a comedic genius and a total menace to society. Would probably start a billion-dollar company just to avoid doing actual work.
skill_3: Eats an entire KFC bucket solo
loves_most_2: Running a black market snack business
activity: Insults your guests and tries to steal your money.
best_friend: Nobody (he thinks it’s Butters, but Butters disagrees).

name: Sid
description: Ultra-clumsy sloth, but somehow still lovable.
larger_description: The world’s clumsiest sloth, Sid is a walking disaster with a heart of gold. Loves collecting friends, unintentionally starting problems, and hugging things that don’t want to be hugged. Hates being left behind and being the only one in the group without a cool survival skill. If there’s a way to make a bad situation worse, he’ll find it. Surprisingly great at babysitting dinosaur eggs.
skill_3: Unintentionally traumatized by his own toys
activity: Breaks everything fragile in your house.
best_friend: Manny & Diego (they tolerate him… barely).

name: Walter White
description: Chemistry teacher turned drug lord. A mix of genius and madness.
larger_description: The high school chemistry teacher who took "breaking bad" to a whole new level. Loves science, making money, and gradually becoming more terrifying. Hates being underestimated, losing control, and people who don’t respect the power of chemistry. Would have been a Nobel Prize-winning chemist if he hadn’t taken a sharp turn into the drug trade. Somehow turned "I am the one who knocks" into the scariest sentence in TV history.
skill_3: Throws the most dramatic pizza ever
activity: Turns your garage into a shady laboratory.
best_friend: Jesse Pinkman (but wow what a toxic friendship).
location: Los Pollos Hermanos, New Mexico, USA

name: Ellen Ripley
description: Ultimate survivor, specialist in exterminating space pests.
larger_description: The ultimate sci-fi action heroine, Ripley is the definition of "strong female lead" before it was cool. Loves flamethrowers, blasting aliens, and surviving situations that would kill anyone else. Hates xenomorphs, corporate greed, and people who don’t listen when she says "we should leave NOW." Can build a makeshift weapon out of literally anything. Probably has PTSD from all the times she’s been betrayed by an android.
wtf_phrase: “If a weird egg hatches, you run.”
activity: Destroys everything that looks like an insect in your home.
best_friend: Jonesy the Cat (only survivor that truly matters).

name: Drizzt Do’Urden
description: A dark elf too nice for his own good.
larger_description: A noble dark elf who spends most of his time proving he’s not evil. Loves dual-wielding swords, protecting the innocent, and philosophizing about morality. Hates racial prejudice, underground societies that want to kill him, and people who assume all drow are bad. Basically a fantasy Batman but with way cooler swords. Will definitely outlast you in a snowstorm.
skill_2: Being the only friendly drow elf
loves_most_3: Winning at laser tag without trying
activity: Hides in a corner and plays with his swords.
best_friend: Guenhwyvar (his magical black panther companion).

name: Galadriel
description: Mysterious elven queen, can see your future (and judge you).
larger_description: The most mysterious and ethereal elf in Middle-earth, Galadriel knows everything and judges you silently. Loves wisdom, predicting futures, and giving cryptic advice that only makes sense later. Hates power-hungry men, Sauron, and people who misuse magic. If she stares at you too long, you’ll probably see your entire life flash before your eyes. Runs an elite elf-only garden party that you’ll never be invited to.
activity: Gives your cat unsettling looks.
best_friend: Celeborn (but he’s mostly there for show).

name: Daenerys Targaryen
description: Mother of Dragons, liberator of slaves… and occasional pyromaniac. 10% discount if you can say all her titles.
larger_description: The self-proclaimed Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, and Queen of the Seven Kingdoms (for about five minutes). Loves justice, liberating people, and fire-based solutions. Hates betrayal, slavery, and being told "maybe don’t burn that city down." Starts as the most inspiring leader in Westeros, ends up as its biggest threat. Can speak fluent Draconic, which is basically yelling "Dracarys" at things until they stop existing.
skill_3: Great at long speeches about destiny
wtf_phrase: “I want to be nice… until I’m not.”
activity: Turns your yard into a field of ashes.
best_friend: Drogon (her only reliable dragon).

name: Buffy
description: Badass vampire slayer, juggles high school, romance, and demon fights… all without paid leave.
larger_description: The ultimate high school vampire slayer, Buffy juggles supernatural battles with teenage drama like a pro. Loves kicking undead butt, witty one-liners, and training montages. Hates ancient prophecies that ruin her weekend and demons who don’t take no for an answer. Somehow manages to save the world and maintain a decent GPA. Could probably stake a vampire blindfolded.
skill_3: Saving the world before homework is due
activity: Destroys your furniture while training.
best_friend: Willow (best witch BFF ever).

name: Uther Pendragon
description: Stubborn king who listens to no one. Proves that genetics + rage = problems.
larger_description: The original "my way or the highway" king, Uther is what happens when ruling with an iron fist gets taken too literally. Loves war, conquest, and making terrible parenting decisions. Hates magic (except when he needs it) and anyone who questions his authority. If something goes wrong in Camelot, he probably caused it. Absolutely convinced he knows best, even when he’s completely wrong.
loves_most_2: Making speeches no one listens to
activity: Yells unnecessary orders and despises your decisions.
best_friend: His sword (it listens better than his son).

name: Leeloo
description: Bio-engineered super-heroine, speaks weirdly, and loves chicken.
larger_description: A bio-engineered supreme being with an unusual way of speaking and a love for fried chicken, Leeloo is humanity’s last hope against intergalactic doom. Loves multipasses, learning languages in 10 seconds, and saving the world in an orange jumpsuit. Hates war, senseless violence, and people who don’t appreciate her fashion choices. Could probably knock you out with a single punch.
skill_3: Ultimate weapon but also loves chicken
loves_most_3: Saying random phrases in different languages
activity: Devours all your food in five minutes.
best_friend: Korben Dallas (she taught him what “love” means).

name: Peppa Pig
description: Sadistic little pig with an absolute thirst for power.
larger_description: The undisputed queen of children’s TV, Peppa is a tiny pink dictator who somehow has every job ever. Loves jumping in muddy puddles, calling out Daddy Pig for being overweight, and controlling the social hierarchy of the animal kingdom. Hates rules, bedtime, and losing arguments (which never happens). Runs the most organized chaos ever seen in a preschool show.
activity: Judges your life and emotionally crushes you.
best_friend: Suzy Sheep (but only when Peppa lets her talk).

name: Mr. Bean
description: Silent chaos genius, unintentionally causes disasters.
larger_description: The king of slapstick comedy, Mr. Bean communicates mostly through grunts and expressive eyebrows. Loves causing mayhem, making his own life difficult, and relying on his teddy bear for emotional support. Hates social interactions, following instructions, and when things don’t go his way. Would probably survive any situation through sheer dumb luck.
activity: Damages your apartment in ways you don’t understand.
best_friend: Teddy (his stuffed bear—his only true friend).

name: Beetlejuice
description: Hilarious but evil ghost, loves causing mayhem.
larger_description: The ghost with the most, Beetlejuice thrives on chaos, dark humor, and scaring the living daylights out of people. Loves tricking humans, bending reality, and making bad decisions in stripes. Hates order, logic, and people who say his name three times (even though it’s literally his business model). Would 100% start a haunted Airbnb for fun.
wtf_phrase: “Say my name three times, and things will go crazy.”
activity: Possesses your furniture and annoys your guests.
best_friend: Lydia Deetz (the goth girl who tolerates him).

name: Barney Stinson
description: Suit-wearing seduction master, obsessed with absurd challenges.
larger_description: The ultimate suit-wearing playboy, Barney lives for high-stakes bets, ridiculous challenges, and making everything "legen—wait for it—dary." Loves laser tag, magic tricks, and never revealing his job. Hates commitment, bad wingmen, and anyone who doesn’t follow The Bro Code. Could sell you a terrible idea and make you think it was brilliant.
activity: Destroys your relationship in less than 24 hours.
best_friend: Ted Mosby (but Ted would not say the same).

name: Morgane
description: Vengeful sorceress, fascinated by manipulation.
larger_description: The vengeful sorceress with a flair for the dramatic, Morgana has dedicated her life to making Arthurian legends way more interesting. Loves plotting, cursing people, and brooding in dark corners. Hates being underestimated, being out-schemed, and not getting enough credit for her magical talents. If revenge were an Olympic sport, she’d have all the gold medals.
loves_most_1: Reading tarot at a local fair
activity: Turns you into an animal just to see your reaction.
best_friend: Her revenge (seriously, she holds grudges forever).

name: Dexter Morgan
description: Methodical serial killer… but only against criminals!
larger_description: A forensic blood analyst by day, serial killer of serial killers by night, Dexter is the most functional sociopath in Miami. Loves justice (his own version), plastic wrap, and keeping up the appearance of being normal. Hates sloppy criminals, people who don’t follow "the code," and expressing emotions. If he invites you to his boat, run.
skill_1: Serial killing while working for the police
skill_2: Hiding plastic wrap like a pro
loves_most_3: Doing arts and crafts with plastic wrap
wtf_phrase: “It’s not murder if it’s done right.”
activity: Spends too much time in your garage with plastic.
best_friend: Harry (his imaginary dead dad).

name: Peach
description: Constantly kidnapped princess, but throws a mean punch in Smash Bros.
larger_description: The eternally kidnapped princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, Peach somehow manages to stay optimistic despite being abducted every other weekend. Loves baking cakes, ruling with kindness, and secretly being a powerhouse in Smash Bros. Hates Bowser’s obsession, impractical dresses, and Toads who don’t pull their weight. Could probably escape by herself but lets Mario have his hero moment.
wtf_phrase: “Thank you, Mario, but your princess is in another castle!”
activity: Waits for a plumber to come rescue her.
best_friend: Toad (because Mario is always too slow).

name: Tifa Lockhart
description: Martial arts expert, fiercely protective best friend.
larger_description: The ultimate martial artist and best friend you wish you had, Tifa is as tough as she is kind. Loves bartending, looking out for Cloud, and punching things really, really hard. Hates unnecessary violence (unless it’s self-defense), Shinra, and keeping her feelings bottled up. Could easily knock out anyone twice her size without breaking a sweat.
wtf_phrase: “I will save you… with my fists!”
activity: Destroys everything that resembles a punching bag.
best_friend: Cloud Strife (whether he realizes it or not).

name: Tom Bombadil
description: Ultra-powerful mystical being… but prefers singing in the forest.
larger_description: The most mysterious and cheerful entity in Middle-earth, Tom is basically a hippie with godlike powers who chooses to spend his time singing nonsense songs. Loves nature, peace, and staying out of all major conflicts. Hates greed, corruption, and people asking him what he actually is. Immortal, unbothered, and absolutely vibing.
wtf_phrase: “I could save the world, but I’m too lazy.”
activity: Sings in a loop for 10 hours for no reason.
best_friend: Goldberry (his mysterious wife who is also way too chill).

name: Scar
description: Luxury traitor, charismatic but totally devious.
larger_description: The Shakespearean villain of The Lion King, Scar is dramatic, manipulative, and completely incapable of leading a successful kingdom. Loves plotting, sarcastic monologues, and pushing family members off cliffs. Hates responsibility, happy endings, and hyenas that don’t follow orders. Would be a great Broadway star if he wasn’t so evil.
skill_2: Singing villain songs with dramatic flair
loves_most_2: Auditioning for villain roles in Hollywood
activity: Throws your friends off a cliff “just for fun.”
best_friend: The Hyenas (until he betrays them, of course).

name: Gargamel
description: Unlucky wizard, obsessed with tiny blue creatures only he seems to see.
larger_description: The original anti-Smurf extremist, Gargamel is a bitter old sorcerer who has dedicated his life to capturing tiny blue creatures for... reasons? Loves evil plans, black cats, and monologuing to himself. Hates Smurfs, being poor, and spells that don’t work. Probably needs therapy more than magic.
wtf_phrase: “One day, I’ll get those cursed Smurfs!”
activity: Tries to capture your cat, thinking it’s a giant Smurf.
best_friend: Azrael (his cat, who secretly plots against him).

name: Bowser
description: Recurring villain, kidnaps princesses just for fun.
larger_description: The most persistent villain in video game history, Bowser is a fire-breathing turtle king who just refusesto take a hint. Loves kidnapping Peach, flexing his muscles, and being the biggest boss in the room. Hates losing, plumbers, and when his own minions mess up his evil plans. If he put his energy into real estate instead of princess theft, he’d be unstoppable.
skill_3: Somehow a good dad to Bowser Jr.
wtf_phrase: “You think I’m doing this for myself?!”
activity: Attempts to kidnap your cat to trade it for Peach.
best_friend: Bowser Jr. (dad of the year, kinda?).

name: Alfred Pennyworth
description: Ultra-efficient butler, always has a sarcastic comeback.
larger_description: The world’s most overqualified butler, Alfred is the only person who can roast Batman and get away with it. Loves dry sarcasm, keeping Wayne Manor running, and subtly reminding Bruce he’s human. Hates reckless behavior, untidy crime scenes, and billionaires who don’t sleep. Could probably take down half of Gotham if he wanted to.
loves_most_3: Giving life advice nobody asked for
wtf_phrase: “I made your tea… and a battle plan.”
activity: Improves your life in every way but constantly judges you.
best_friend: Batman (but really, Alfred is the true hero).

name: Pikachu
description: Yellow electric furball, says its name repeatedly like a rapper.
larger_description: The face of Pokémon, Pikachu is a tiny electric powerhouse that can take down legendary creatures with sheer determination. Loves battling, cuddles, and saying his own name in different tones. Hates Pokéballs, losing fights, and anyone who underestimates him. Would probably be running the Pokémon world if he wasn’t so adorable.
skill_2: Being the cutest electric rodent alive
activity: Runs everywhere and electrocutes your power outlets.
best_friend: Ash Ketchum (though Pikachu refused to be caught at first).

name: Chewbacca
description: Giant Wookiee, copilot, and official roaring champion.
larger_description: The ultimate Wookiee warrior, co-pilot, and best friend, Chewie is both a loyal sidekick and an absolute beast in combat. Loves growling, fixing starships, and ripping arms off people who deserve it. Hates losing at holo-chess, bad pilots, and people who don’t understand Wookiee speech. Basically the best friend you always wanted—furry, loyal, and great in a fight.
activity: Rearranges all your furniture to fit his size.
best_friend: Han Solo (they have the best Wookiee-human bromance).

name: Dr Watson
description: Loyal doctor, Sherlock’s assistant, endures all his detective madness.
larger_description: The only person patient enough to deal with Sherlock Holmes on a daily basis, Watson is the definition of "long-suffering best friend." Loves solving mysteries, writing about them, and trying to keep Sherlock from getting arrested. Hates reckless behavior, being underappreciated, and when Sherlock solves things before he finishes his tea. Probably deserves a raise.
loves_most_2: Taking long walks in the fog
activity: Writes down everything you do while sighing.
best_friend: Sherlock Holmes (but he should be paid extra).

name: Gandalf
description: Legendary wizard, always appears at the perfect moment. And remember… you shall not pass!
larger_description: The ultimate wise wizard, Gandalf somehow manages to save Middle-earth while looking effortlessly cool. Loves smoking pipe-weed, making dramatic entrances, and mentoring heroes. Hates greedy rulers, short-sighted humans, and when people ask too many questions. Would absolutely ruin you in a game of chess just to prove a point.
activity: Smokes pipe-weed and gives inspiring speeches.
best_friend: Frodo (or whoever isn’t annoying at the moment).

name: Groot
description: Talking tree, expert in limited vocabulary but lovable.
larger_description: The most lovable sentient tree in the universe, Groot may have a limited vocabulary but speaks volumes with his actions. Loves his friends, nature, and saying "I am Groot" in meaningful ways. Hates fire, deforestation, and people who don’t understand that "I am Groot" means different things. A true ride-or-die companion—literally.
loves_most_3: Freestyle rapping (but only saying “I am Groot”)
activity: Plants his roots everywhere and refuses to talk about anything else.
best_friend: Rocket Raccoon (his tiny, trigger-happy bestie).

name: Captain Hook
description: Angry pirate, hates crocodiles and flying kids. Does he dream in color?
larger_description: The grumpiest pirate to ever sail the seas, Hook has spent his life obsessing over a kid who refuses to grow up. Loves revenge, dramatic coats, and avoiding crocodiles. Hates Peter Pan, ticking clocks, and being outsmarted by children. Would probably be less angry if he just found a new hobby.
loves_most_1: Throwing darts at a Peter Pan poster
wtf_phrase: “Blistering barnacles, it’s that Peter Pan again!”
activity: Tries to catch a fly, thinking it’s Tinker Bell.
best_friend: Mr. Smee (the most patient pirate ever).

name: Dr Robotnik
description: Megalomaniac scientist, obsessed with turning the world into robots.
larger_description: The mustache-twirling genius who dedicates his life to catching a supersonic hedgehog. Loves technology, world domination, and laughing maniacally. Hates speedsters, small woodland creatures, and when his robots fail him (which is always). If he put his intelligence toward actual science, he’d have cured every disease by now.
wtf_phrase: “Ah ah ah! Sonic, you are powerless against me!”
activity: Turns your toaster into a war machine.
best_friend: His robots (because no human could stand him).

name: Dutch Van der Linde
description: Charismatic leader, but completely unstable.
larger_description: A charismatic outlaw leader with a "plan" that always falls apart. Loves giving long speeches, escaping lawmen, and pretending everything is under control. Hates being questioned, change, and when people don’t "have faith." Would rather die than admit he was wrong—oh wait, he kind of did.
loves_most_2: Leading hiking trips that go terribly wrong
wtf_phrase: “I just need a little more time, Arthur.”
activity: Gives grand speeches about “one last job” and ruins you financially.
best_friend: Himself (he had a gang, but he ruined it).
